height.description: a numeric number representing block index, 0 is the genesis block

author.description: the public key of the person who authored this block

difficulty.description: the difficulty level used in computing this block

prevBlockHash.description: the hash of the previous block on the chain

epoch.description: a UNIX timestamp of when this block was mined

token_transactions.description: an array of token transactions that occured in this block

concluded_ventures.description: an array of all completed ventures that occured in this block
